name: Change of Base Formula
explanation: The change of base formula allows you to convert a logarithm from one base to another. This is useful because calculators typically only have buttons for base 10 (log) and base e (ln). The formula states that log base b of a equals the log of a divided by the log of b, in any common base (usually 10 or e).

examples.problem: Evaluate log₂(8) using change of base
